DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Improves Coronary Endothelial Dysfunction Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: write informed consent preserve leave ventricular function ( left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50 % ) physical work capacity ≥ 50 W least one significant coronary stenosis > 50 % , whereas either left anterior descending ( LAD ) circumflex artery ( RCX ) free disease stenoses ≤ 25 % assessment intracoronary flow measurement diseases affect endothelial function untreated hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure > 90 mm Hg ) cigarette smoke previous six month LDLcholesterol > 4.3 mmol/l ventricular tachyarrhythmias chronic obstructive pulmonary disease severe renal hepatic dysfunction valvular heart disease myocardial infarction within previous 4 week
